text:
This is about our future promotional material
...I'm sure you have a rough idea of it.

This will be an approach that could give more
opportunities to 283PRO idols.

I'd like to hear your opinion.
...What do you think?"

After all, it would be real-time streaming. We can create
more chances than ever for our idols to communicate...

I believe that this will bring the voices
of idols closer to as many people as possible.

Do what you think is right,
Hazuki, please support him.
I'll leave it to you both.
